clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: ul li 10 hydrate skin li li 15 accelerate fibrin degradation li li 20 30 are antipruritic break down keratin decrease the thickness of the stratum corneum and are used in scaling conditions such as ichthysosis li li 40 are proteolytic and may be used to dissolve and peel dystrophic nails li ul br Patient Self Care 2010 br

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: As a humectant urea draws water into the striatum corneum
